ApexCodeCoverage.name: ApexCodeCoverage
ApexCodeCoverage.description: Represents code coverage test results for an Apex class or trigger.

ApexTestClassId.description: The ID of the test class.

TestMethodName.description: The name of the test method.

ApexClassorTriggerId.description: The ID of the class or trigger under test.

Coverage.description: Two lists of integers. The first is the covered lines, and the second is the list of uncovered lines. If a line is missing from both lists, the line isn’t executable and doesn’t require coverage.

ApexCodeCoverage.accessRules: In API version 49.0 and later, users must have the View Setup and Configuration and View All Data permissions to access this object.
